content:
S-waiting-on-author

#80822 April 30 - pinged author - author: Aaron1011, reviewer: nagisa
#75737 May 17 - pinged author - author: davidtwco, reviewer: oli-obk
#84096 June 27 - pinged author - author: m-ou-se, reviewer: joshtriplett
#84640 July 2 - looks like author needs to address some reviews - author: ids1024, reviewer: SimonSapin
#85830 July 6 - needs rebase, but it also seems that reviewer is not yet convinced the change is worth the complexity - author: bjorn3, reviewer: cjgillot
#78991 July 6 - unsure of status - author: Aaron1011, reviewer: petrochenkov
#78781 July 9 - has merge conflicts, but skipped ping for now - author: eddyb, reviewer: oli-obk
#86022 July 27 - unsure of status - author: jyn514, reviewer: Mark-Simulacrum
#84385 July 28 - seems like Niko is unsure if this is the best way to fix the bug - author: Aaron1011, reviewer: nikomatsakis
#87396 19 days - seems to require decision about scope? - author: inquisitivecrystal, reviewer: Mark-Simulacrum
#86896 19 days - seems like it may be superseded by #85868, which was just approved - author: Aaron1011, reviewer: varkor
#81617 19 days - no updates since last ping, but it was only 19 days ago that we pinged - author: sdroege, reviewer: Amanieu
#86646 19 days - seems to just add a feature flag; not sure why it's a separate PR; CI is failing because of missing trailing comma - author: kolharsam, reviewer: estebank
#83371 19 days - waiting on changes from author; last ping was 19 days ago, so didn't ping - author: gilescope, reviewer: kennytm
#83846 19 days - waiting on author to fix Windows test failure it seems - author: torhovland, reviewer: davidtwco
#86531 18 days - CI is failing, and PR is marked as "DO NOT MERGE" - author: ijackson, reviewer: joshtriplett

S-waiting-on-review

cuviper
